website_summaries.verdict: A stylish kneeling chair that is both comfortable and supportive. Simple design is effective and good-looking.
pros: Strong wood frame, supportive cushioning, and an ergonomic design that originally made kneeling chairs popular
Owners with pain issues are impressed with how well it helps relieve their issues
Attractive design looks great in any room

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive chair (nobody would argue that) but this is one instance where you get what you pay for. Well-constructed, attractive, and comfortable. Sure, you could pick up a knockoff made in China and save yourself money, but it won’t be as nice as the Balans (probably not even close) in terms of quality and lasting durability.
customer_reviews.author: ignis075

customer_reviews.title: Amazing desk chair.
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I had one that I used for decades, but when I sold my house and left my desk for the new owners, they wanted the chair also. This new one is just as wonderful. Easy to put together even for a 65-year-old lady. Amazing desk chair. My only complaint is that there are only a few color choices. I went with the black fabric, but it attracts every single hair that my two cats shed throughout the day. It would’ve been nice to have a few more choices of different woods and fabrics to choose from. In the end, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R Denson

customer_reviews.title: It's super comfortable and it's easy to mash out the desk ...
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is my second Balans chair. I have one at the office, and one at my home office. I get more work done sitting in this chair than any other chair I've worked in. It's super comfortable and it's easy to mash out the desk work sitting in the Balans. I like the constant motion of the chair. It's nice to be able to move around in different positions. This chair really seems to help me stay focused better too. The Balans provides spinal support and good balance for long sitting sessions. I'm very pleased with BOTH of my Balans chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G

customer_reviews.title: I don't know that I'd buy this product again, ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that I'd buy this product again, instead of a ball to sit on. I bought the fabric version and find the fabric on my bare skin (I live in the desert; wear shorts 9 months out of 12) to be very uncomfortable - get the fabric pattern etched in my knees. That's when I know it's time to sit in the chair and readjust my mouse/keyboard. I tried microfiber cloth on top and that helps a bit. Even feel it on my knees if I'm wearing capri length yoga pants. Didn't want leather because it's hot in the summer and cold in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: CSWJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this chair. I am busted up all kinds of way. My knee barely gets past 90 degrees on the left, my low back hurts and I'm now working from home at a desk so add the neck. I ordered this after reviewing several ergonomic chair options. It's comfortable and I love the options to move around and change position in. Added bonus is getting a gentle knee stretch. I noticed a difference after one day! I know that doesn't sound possible but it's true. The kids also love to play with it so I might be getting a few more to put downstairs as seating options
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable, great for posture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable, and has significantly helped my posture. I highly recommend this chair. Please remember as it states in the instructions that your muscles will be sore the first week of use as you get used to correct posture and core muscle use. Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Seth Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  But not for me. 😟
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kneeling chair! It’s simple and well constructed. I bought it because I was having an issue with my back. Unfortunately I also have an issue with my knee. So I ultimately returned it. It had great finish, clear instructions, nice fabric and it was really easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: BarrySaukee

customer_reviews.title: Can't assemble; screw threads missing
customer_reviews.text: One of the knee-pads had missing screw threads, so we could not finish assembly. It would be great to get a replacement knee pad, but I can't find any way to contact the seller. Amazon offers returns on this item, but no replacement at this time. We'll just have to send it back due to sloppy quality control at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: bridgecross

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: It looks simple - no strings attached, no mechanical details or dozens of features, options and instructions. Yet, it's a masterpiece. I spend a ton of time at my desk, and my back gets stiff. The chair removes the pressure and the weight from your spine and distributes it throughout the whole body - comfortable, doesn't take much space at all, easy to use, clean and move - it's a lifetime purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alla Gringaus

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much I bought a second but came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The first chair was a much lighter blue than anticipated, but so comfy that I didn't even care (I plan to cover it with something later). It scratched up the floor IMMEDIATELY however, before I put on the tape. The second chair did not come with tape, and I would really not like to pay 50 for the tape. Please send it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Annony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Your 12 year old could assemble this unless his name is Fido.
customer_reviews.text: I could have bought an older more original one on eBay, like the one I had 20 years ago, but I'm glad I got a new one. The only limitation is that unless you get one of the basic color choices you need to wait a month or two (if you buy from the manufacturer). Don't bother paying extra for expert assembly. A 12 year old could do it and get a feeling of accomplishment. Much of the time I use it simply as a rocking stool without using the shin supports. Or sometimes I just use one. Comes with the necessary Allen wrench.
customer_reviews.author: George Turner

customer_reviews.title: First chair that I can sit for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had issue with chairs. I am a very fidgety person, or so I thought. I've tried affordable Ikea office chairs to expensive Herman Millers. I even believed I lack patience. Then my wife recommended the Balans and I'm glad I gave it a shot. For the first time in my life, I can sit in front of my computer and work / study for multiple hours. I do feel some pressure on my knees, but I just need to remember one leg in front and switch from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good for back without a backrest
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great, without a back rest, I because of the shape of the chair that pulls you forward it forces you to maintain and S curve when you sit on it. It is great for people with a weak core and bad back. I am buying another one for the office
customer_reviews.author: oh yoon ohm

customer_reviews.title: Great for posture, relieves unconcious stress on the spine
customer_reviews.text: I saw this first at a friend's house. She's had her's from when she was 15 years old. Whenever I visit her, I love sitting on it. It aligns my back and suddenly relieves all the unconcious stress on it from the moment I sit on it. I finally made the investment and love it!
customer_reviews.author: APEnchanted

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic wand
customer_reviews.text: Like: 1-easy to assemble 2-not made in China 3-attractive design Dislike: 1-not easy on the shins despite padding 2-no choice in padding color Can not find a chair to make working at home easier; thought this would help cut down on pain from sitting in front of computer at home all day; doesn't - still have pain; I know I need to get up and walk every now and then, but much prefer chair in office I can no longer go back to!
customer_reviews.author: Aarondean

customer_reviews.title: The best desk chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought another one of these! I used this type of chair all through medical school studies! Keeps your back in perfect alignment and your body in perfect balance. Bought one for each of my college kids. Very sturdy— so well worth the cost. Never had one break
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable chair. I wanted to put it in the offce, but I am not able to use it because the kids are always on it. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: Corrects slouching, cost a lot
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. This chair corrects my posture and slouch. It also supports my spine and lower back. However, after an hour, it starts to make my knees sore. This chair is well-built, and well-designed chair. But for what you get, I believe it is over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Booked-UP

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a knock off. Buy Varier
customer_reviews.text: I selected the Varier chair after reading mixed reviews on the cheaper knock offs where there were concerns over quality and ease of assembly. Varier made a video warning against purchasing a knock off standing behind their superior craftsmanship. I have no complaints. It was easy to assemble and exactly the product as advertised. Anyone looking at this chair should know that you switch between this and a traditional chair throughout the day. You don't want to sit in it all day. But, it's saved my back and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine D. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chair. Excellent Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving my new chair. It’s very sturdy and well built. Assembly was easy. I have been suffering from sciatic nerve pain and lower back pain for several months. This chair has helped tremendously! Pain relief is almost immediate in the lower back. I worked up to 8 hours in about a week. My shins don’t get sore as long as I shift positions frequently. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anteau

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together- only 6 parts! And it's super fun/comfortable to use. Built in flex make it easy to reach for things, and the rocking capability is really nice. I don't feel like I'm fighting my body to sit up straight all day. It's AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Green

customer_reviews.title: A little wiggly
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair, liked the ability to rock a little bit and it wasn’t difficult to assemble. I sent it back because it felt too wiggly, like it needs a support between the front runner/knee pads. For this price I need to love it and I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not ideal for long legs :(
customer_reviews.text: Well made, flexible rocking/kneeling chair, def keeps the hips open, abs engaged and back straight in a modified hero-like pose. Unfortunately I’m 5-11, so my long legs are 2-3 inches too long, my butt sits on the back edge; has no where to go but off the back of the chair, and there is not enough padding in the seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Kramer

customer_reviews.title: The price changed after 6 months. What the deuce.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. Kneeling chairs helps to push straight postures while performing work, light gaming, or surfing the web. Feels more flexible compared to a traditional chair. The 3 stars felt like the pricing may be a bit unfair up until now. I bought the chair for $300 but the market was set at $200 after those 6-7 months. Should've waited til now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a chair (with caveat)
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for about 2 months. While I enjoy the kneeling position, I don't think I could kneel for extended time. Since I have a standing/sitting desk I alternate and it works great for me. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tichy

customer_reviews.title: Better than a standard office chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the first kneeling chair I have tried, figured I should buy the original as I saw reviews on the cheaper models and the quality didn't seem to be there. Would love to have a little more cushion on my bottom but feels fineost of the time. Love that it rocks, corrects your posture if you sit in it correctly, perfect for switching to between standing at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great! Wrong color but even better!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Really nice quality. Beautiful color! I would’ve ordered this color if I had seen it as a choice. I ordered gray and this yellowish green chair arrived. It’s awesome. You can see in the picture of the manual there are several chairs of different colors that are not being offered here on Amazon. I’m glad I was pleasantly surprised. Perhaps others would not have appreciated the switch though. So far so good with the ergonomics.
customer_reviews.author: jezebelle lee

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid quality and what a little beauty it is
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe he easily I just started using this kneeling chair. I had doubts getting it. But after first use I have not sat in a regular chair since... at least not while working at my computer, which is what I'm using the kneeling chair for. On top of that, it's light and easy to move around. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: michael olsen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair to be used at my computer desk, for better posture and lower back pain. It is well-constructed and easy to assemble. I prefer this chair now, over all my other desk chairs. I am mindful of my posture while at my computer, and have less back pain as a result.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Jeppson

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: i used this chair many years ago at a European company i worked at - and i have to say i am so happy i spent the money - for the last 2 weeks i have had no back pain. another advantage, it is compact and fits under my desk when not in use - which is nice living in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable kneeling chair I had a chance to use. The pads hard and have no cushioning whatsoever. After only a few minutes sitting on it, your body starts hurting. I am very dissatisfied with this purchase and regret not returning it. I wonder whether this is really an original Peter Opsvik's chair. It feels like a cheap fake made in China.
customer_reviews.author: proactive

customer_reviews.title: Garbage of the highest caliber
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the wood holes splitting and obviously very poorly made, but the holes in the seat don’t remotely line up with the legs. Unless you’re a wizard, you’re not going to be able to assemble or use this chair. The quality is so poor, I’m almost glad it’s defective & I’m not tempted to keep it. Guys...just don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: amazonwoman

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware, pieces arrived with minor damage
customer_reviews.text: This is some pretty poor quality control. On their packing slip, they checked "screw bag", but there is no screw bag anywhere to be found. I don't have any of the required hardware to actually assemble this thing. While the damage is pretty superficial, its just salt to to the wound with the missing hardware. For a $350 chair, and for something this simple, I expected nothing less than perfect. I hope the replacement will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Tran

customer_reviews.title: No more back issues!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so much money in the past year on a different chair, yoga ball, cushions, PT, massage therapy, TENS unit... all because my new job has me putting more pressure on my back from sitting. This chair makes all the difference for me! The position, but also the fact that it rocks. When I lean forward, there's no added pressure on my knees or back. It has been a life and pain saver for me and I would highly recommend it to others! They have wonderful customer service and if you have any concerns or issues, they back their product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Get this one, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica and this chair is awesome. The wood design gives more flexibility and comfort and the fact that it rocks a bit allows you to adjust your weight a little if you are using this chair for a long time. Took a little futzing to get the seat on but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first. However, after 3 weeks or so, I am enjoying the chair. History of lower back pain and this prevents me from slouching. Highly recommended! If you have a larger desk area that requires you to move around, I recommend looking at one that has wheels.
customer_reviews.author: RinGo1113

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have learned about this sooner. Beware that it can take 30 days or so for you to get used to this. The instructions warn you about using it along with your regular chair until you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Moreable Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, easy to assemble, excellent quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I sat on one of these years ago and wanted one. Finally, i decided to treat myself ! It is worth the money because of the long-lasting design and materials. Danish and Norwegians sure know how to make quality furniture!
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Second one I have owned
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable than conventional chair. Feels better, particularly on back and legs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair
customer_reviews.text: I am working on a desk all day, so I decided to invest in the future health of my back and buy this chair. I am very pleased with it and it looks pretty neat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nils Haakon Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is fine, easy to put together... but they sent me the wrong product. I got the black/natural wood combination instead of the black/black one I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and excellent customer service. I was able to order a matching backrest for this chair direct from seller. This chair has helped with my lower back pain while sitting. I'm considering buying one for work as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Wernert

customer_reviews.title: Better than standard seating
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my knees as it’s actually my shins that are used. Much better for my lower back but I did notice pain in my tailbone if I sit too long. It may simply be a matter of adjusting to different muscles and sitting further back on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Castle-Aneals

customer_reviews.title: 5 star quality
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Makes sitting and working from my desk much more comfortable. If correct posture is important to you, buy this chair.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: So versatile
customer_reviews.text: So many different ways to sit on this chair. I love that ! It takes up very little space as well. It came unassembled but it is such a simple design it only took me 10 minutes to put it together. I love this chair
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Super super easy assemble.  Comfortable.  Would be nice if it help the shins from slipping.
customer_reviews.text: Nice alternative to the normal office chair, it isn’t the best of its kind but good and will help with office relief. I’d recommend for on the budget moments.
customer_reviews.author: glenn lopez

customer_reviews.title: Will adjust posture/ correct sitting position
customer_reviews.text: I love how natural it feels to sit on this and my pinched nerve corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Wynter

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My grandparents had one of these when I was little and I loved it. The current version seems very cheap and not very sturdy -- the unit wobbles slightly and I can't imagine it will hold up in the long run. Wish I had gone with a less expensive version.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Well crafted and comfortable. Of course some getting used to but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlino

customer_reviews.title: Gift Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for a friend, and he reports that it is really comfortable. I was happy to hear this report, and especially given its cost.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t line up
customer_reviews.text: The holes are on the top seat are a inch off so I can’t screw the seat on. Hopefully the second one will actually fit together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Cheaply made. Didn’t even fit together properly. Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Cheaply made. Didn’t even fit together properly. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: taryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Very good for my lower back pain. So light and easy to manoeuvre too!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Sallee McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Then I moved across the country and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Balans chair about 2 years after they first came on the market. Loved it. Then I moved across the country and had to give it away. I never thought they were still being made--then I found this. It's as good as the first one I had. So glad to find it again because I really hate regular chairs and this makes working at my desk much less deadening.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Jane Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: 400$ is absurd for such poor quality frame design
customer_reviews.text: Very rickety and loose... I'm 6'1", 190 pounds and i cant image it would work to well for someone over 200... yes, i assembled it correctly, its just a weak frame design and its very wobbly when under weight, 400$ is absurd for such poor quality frame design, i could literally build this design for less than 20 dollars in my garage, i feel pretty stupid for buying it... but I'm trying anything at this point apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Matticus

customer_reviews.title: Best for posture and relief of back and neck pain
customer_reviews.text: If you do any research you know what you're getting...THE BEST! And you do get what you pay for. Very easy to assemble and very comfortable. I use it every day as my desk chair at work 8+ hours in it!
customer_reviews.author: reywalwen

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I kept this-after years is siatic nerve pain I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a blessing for me! I am so glad I kept this-after years is siatic nerve pain I am feeling no pain!!! Read the directions many times🌻
customer_reviews.author: Lavander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for a friend and appears to be satisfied. arrived as stated. easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: michelle jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Decent little chair
customer_reviews.text: Hurts my shins after 2-3 hours, fairly comfortable in every other aspect. Doesn't look or feel like what it cost me, in my personal opinion. Still able to slouch of course. It has bend to it from side to side, which I'm assuming is intentional - just warn your guests a little about that before they get on.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Whispers

customer_reviews.title: This chair is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the best thing ever! My back feels so much better - it makes me sit up straight and stop hunching! Very well-constructed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Has been working out fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Has been working out fine so far, allows me to sit in a couple of positions and I think has helped reduce my slouching. One star docked only because it's pretty expensive for some basic pieces of wood and fabric, I guess you're paying for the design.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hamid

customer_reviews.title: One of the original kneeling chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Chair is fairly comfortable and easy to assemble. My previous kneeling chair was an adjustable metal frame, surprisingly this one is as comfortable without the adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: John Turner

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say I hate it, but I can't use it and have ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat cushion does not match up with the screw holes by a long shot. This cushion must go with another product. I wouldn't say I hate it, but I can't use it and have to send it back. I'm just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish this chair was cheaper so I could buy another one !
customer_reviews.author: BES

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is made for a child not an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

product_meta.title: Varier Variable Balans Original Kneeling Chair Designed by Peter Opsvik (Black Revive Fabric with Black Ash Base)
feature_bullets: The ONLY original kneeling chair designed by Peter Opsvik in 1979
Now includes FREE soft tape ($50 value) for floor protection! Avoid scratches on hard floors
Highest quality wood means no additional crossbar needed
Most flexible and strongest wood on the market gives extra flexibility and bends better.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
